bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was reported to the Senate on March 9, 2004. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) to extend, at the request of the project licensee, the deadline for commencement of construction of hydroelectric project number 1651 in the State of Wyoming for three consecutive two-year periods from the expiration of the extension originally issued by the Commission.
